Item.Des: Safeguard your room keys at all times. Should you misplace your room key, notify a member of Guest Services. Proper identification is required to receive a new key.
Do not admit unknown persons in your room without properly identifying them. Any concerns regarding a person¿s identify should be conveyed to our Security Team.

The Hotel Security department is staffed with training officers 24 hours a day and is available to assist guests at any time. We value your safety and the security of your personal property. We urge you to take advantage of the following recommendations.

For additional security while in your guest room please utilize the dead bolt as well as all door locking features. This will prevent the door from being opened from the outside. A Do Not Disturb hanger is also available for your added privacy.
For your convenience, a complimentary safe is located in every guest room.
Additional safe deposit boxes are available by the Front Desk at no additional cost.
Promptly report any suspicious or indecent telephone calls to our Security Team.

In the event of a "Life Threatening Emergency" please call 113 from any phone inside the hotel. Immediately after calling 113 please report the emergency to the Security Team by calling Ext. 55. A security officer will respond immediately to assist you.

For non-emergency assistance from the Security Department (to report minor injuries, losses, noise complaints and other disturbances) please call Ext. 55. Please give your full name and room number when calling. A security officer will respond to assist you as soon as possible.

When there is a file alarm, the strobe lights in your guest room will flash and a public announcement regarding the alarm investigation will be made. Please listen carefully to all public announcements for further instruction.

Do not use elevators. There are guest stairwells for the guest floors. When an evacuation is necessary and evacuation announcement will sound over the PA system. Go to the nearest stairwell and walk calmly down the stairs, exit the building and stand by to receive further instructions. Please also refer to the evacuation map placed on the back of each guest room entry door.
In the event of severe weather emergency, an annoucement will be made over th PA system.

<h3>Business Services</h3> - Business Services: Copy service; Fax service; Full-service business center; network/internet printing; Notary public; overnight delivery/pickup; post/parcel<br>- Business Center: a business center is located next to the front desk. The business center features 2 Mac computers and a printer. Open 24 hours.

EVOLVE<br>As you enter the room, insert your key card in the small white box near the light switch to activate the system. This will turn on your in-room lighting, LCD control panel in the bathroom and heating/air conditioning. When exiting your room, please remove your key card. This will disengage the room lights and TV as well as reset your heating/air conditioning unit to a preset confort level and set the foyer light on a 10 second delay shut off.</p>

<p><strong>Power Outlets</strong></p><p>There are additional outlets in each guest room on the bedside lamp and two outlets on the media hub for your convenience. There is also a duplex outlet located in the bathroom. Please be advised that when exiting the room that the EVOLVE system will terminate power from all electrical outlets with the exception of your media hub.</p>

<p><strong>Other Room Amenities</strong></p><br>-  Ice bucket, glasses, and a refrigerator are located in the dresser<br>-  Hairdryers and additional toilet paper are are located in the drawer in the bathroom. If your guest room does not have a drawer in the bathroom these item will be locate in the closet.<br>-   Spare pillows, blankets, ironing boeard, irons and rebes can be found in the closet.;<br>-    TV – you can access in room movie and premium as well as local programing.
